name: Community Based Research on Health Disparities

section.name: Community Based Research on Health Disparities

values.comments:
HSOC330301 is a course on community based research on health disparities. 

Many students were disappointed to find that this course was so disorganized. Though set up like a seminar, students felt the class was more like a lecture. Students were annoyed that the readings were posted late and that the grading system was unclear. Students did enjoy both their group projects of creating their own community based organization and their service projects.

Students felt that while Professor Hughes – Halbert was very knowledgeable, she “did not engage students in discussions.” She also posted and graded assignments late.

Students felt that there was a large time commitment for this class including 3 hours of class and sometimes up to 3 hours of community service.

values.name: Community Based Research on Health Disparities
